snippet.title: Don't Scream - Official Version 1.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
If you scream, you restart. Check out the unsettling launch trailer for Don't Scream, a found-camcorder-footage horror game that utilizes a microphone as you try to stay quiet while exploring a forest for 18 minutes without screaming. Don't Scream leaves Early Access, and the full 1.0 release is out now on Steam.

#DontScream #Gaming #IGN
